enWisdom: The most fearful [of Allah] among you are the ones who know [Him] the most

Wisdom: أَعْظَمُ النَّاسِ عِلْماً أَشَدُّهُمْ خَوْفاً لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: The greatest of people in knowledge are the most intense in [their] fear of Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: أَعْلَمُ [أَخْوَفُ‏] النَّاسِ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَخْوَفُهُمْ مِنْهُ
enWisdom: The most learned of people about Allah, the Glorified, are the most fearful of Him
Whoever fears Allah, his knowledge is complete

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ عَرَفَ اللَّهَ كَيْفَ لَا يَشْتَدُّ خَوْفُهُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who knows Allah, how can his fear [of Him] not become intensified?!
Fear [of Allah] is sufficient as knowledge
There is no knowledge like the fear [and awe] of Allah

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ نَفْسَهُ أَنْ لَا يُفَارِقَهُ الْحَذَرُ وَالنَّدَمُ خَوْفاً أَنْ تَزِلَّ بِهِ الْقَدَمُ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows himself not to be separated from caution and regret out of fear of falling into error
